title: Improve the DefaultItem behavior of the Panorama
body: When you use the DefaultItem property of the Panorama control, it's as if you're just rearranging the items. I use this property to restore application state after tombstoning, but the user experience is terrible because this just causes the pano items to reorder themselves.

comments.body: I think it might be better if they just opened up .SelectedItem to changing.
